I didn't say he [i:27yrjizy]*does*[/i:27yrjizy] read them.
I'm saying he [i:27yrjizy]should[/i:27yrjizy] be able to... Not quite sure as this forum is quite old from what I remember.

Either way he should be able to get access to the SQL database, as he owns the place, and that would allow him access to PM's (I don't know about deleted posts though).

Alex, does your host give you a nice little gui for SQL browsing? Like myphpadmin or something?
That is a life-saver! And the fact that you can set up privalidged users and stuff for just that purpose - giving it over to other users/clients.

CC, instead of thinking how her English may be 'bad' to you, how well do you know [i:1b7agnrh]your[/i:1b7agnrh] second language? Or do you not know one? English is not an easy language to learn.
